title: Hospital Census Unit Manager Dashboard
challenge: Unit Managers at the hospitals lacked real-time patient overview at-a-glance, requiring time-consuming system search and individual patient checks to monitor ward status.

bullets: Unit managers could prioritize care and resource allocation more efficiently

solutions.title: Management Dashboard Redesign
solutions.problem: Analyzed manager information needs and decision patterns. No at-a-glance patient acuity monitoring.
solutions.solution: Comprehensive 4-day patient overview with acuity scoring and filtering.
solutionbullets: Immediate 4-day patient overview with key details visible at a glance
Color-coded acuity indicators with legend, filterable patient categories
impactbullets: Managers gained immediate visibility into patient status, acuity and details
Unit managers could prioritize care and resource allocation more effectively
Significantly reduced time spent tracking patient status
